items.title: ‘It feels like retaliation’: My sister is estranged from her daughter and wants to donate her inheritance. Is that weird?
items.description: “There is a new cultural trend of adult children becoming estranged from their parents.”

items.title: Dow Gains; U.S. Steel Stock Drops
items.description: U.S. stocks moved higher and were on course to break dayslong losing streaks, lifted by tech and chip and energy shares.

items.title: House speaker election: Betting markets give Mike Johnson strong chance of getting job after setbacks in 1st vote
items.description: An initial round of voting in the U.S. House of Representatives looked like it wouldn’t deliver a speaker on Friday, as Louisiana Republican Mike John...

items.title: Gold Settles Lower, Silver Rises
items.description: Gold settled down 0.5% Friday, while silver rose 0.6%. For the week, both metals posted gains.

items.title: Today’s newborns may need $5 million or more for retirement starting in 2100
items.description: Generation Beta could face a major shortfall in savings in 75 years if things don’t change.
